channel.title: Heard 'bout RADIOACTIVE DECAY, a half-life demake by UnrealCanine
channel.description:
Heard bout the already famous Half-Life 1 demake, RADIOACTIVE DECAY? It's a fan game made by Deviantart user, UnrealCanine. That guy re-imagined how HL1 would be as a classic NES game... Seriously, it was friggin good and it had a lot of references and namechanging AF.
Try it, it's already recognized by the LambdaGeneration blog...
Link to the game (Currently divided into 3 segments with 4 chapters each... same as BM, no xen...): [url]https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/652458[/url] - RADIOACTIVE DECAY DAY 1 [url]https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/661158[/url] - RADIOACTIVE DECAY DAY 2 [url]https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/675022[/url] - RADIOACTIVE DECAY DAY 3

item.title: Heard 'bout RADIOACTIVE DECAY, a half-life demake by UnrealCanine
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
Absolutely amazing!

This needs to get on Steam.

Read full topic

item.title: Heard 'bout RADIOACTIVE DECAY, a half-life demake by UnrealCanine
item.dc:creator: Ikkosen
item.description:
Heard bout the already famous Half-Life 1 demake, RADIOACTIVE DECAY? It’s a fan game made by Deviantart user, UnrealCanine.
That guy re-imagined how HL1 would be as a classic NES game… Seriously, it was friggin good and it had a lot of references and namechanging AF.

Try it, it’s already recognized by the LambdaGeneration blog…

Link to the game (Currently divided into 3 segments with 4 chapters each… same as BM, no xen…):
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/652458 - RADIOACTIVE DECAY DAY 1
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/661158 - RADIOACTIVE DECAY DAY 2
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/675022 - RADIOACTIVE DECAY DAY 3

Read full topic
